body: The Court made a confiscation order against you. A copy of the order is enclosed. The Court ordered you to pay a sum of money. This form tells you how to pay that sum, and what may happen if you do not pay.

components.hint: This sum will increase if you have to pay interest - see 'If you do not pay as required' on the next page.
components.label: You must pay
components.name: auto_name__13

components.html:
### Where and how to pay

North East Regional Payment Centre     
HMCTS     
PO BOX 135     
Leeds    
LS27 7ZT

heading: What you must do next
